## Essential Travel Tips
- Book flights & hotel early on cheapoair.com for best rates
- Carry waterproof jackets (if monsoon), sunscreen, hats
- Rent scooter only with valid license, wear helmet
- Respect local beach rules, avoid isolated areas at night
- Goan ATMs available but cash handy for markets/beach shacks

---

## Pre-Trip Checklist
- ID proof for hotel, flight tickets printed/e-copy
- Medicines, swimsuit, flip-flops, phone charger/power bank
- Emergency contacts, local SIM for connectivity
